name: Santiago²

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: How are you today? Santiago is fabulous!

topics.topic_text: Francine warned me that you're a smooth-talker.
topics.response_text: Indeed, Santiago is a poet among pretenders. If you are here to collect for the Garrets, Santiago is debt free.

topics.topic_text: VIP? The Garrets said nothing about VIP status.
topics.response_text: Yes indeed, Santiago is very important. I even have a discount at Mick & Ralph's.

topics.topic_text: 50 Caps is a bit steep, but okay. Here, now what is it?
topics.response_text: Santiago thanks you. Tell Mick Santiago sent you and the code word is 'extravaganza'.

topics.topic_text: I don't even know this discount is worth 50.  How about 25 caps?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] 25 caps will do. Tell Mick Santiago sent you and the code word is 'extravaganza'. He will set you up.

topics.topic_text: Santiago is dead if he doesn’t cough up what he owes the Garrets.
topics.response_text: Sir, Santiago does not know what he has done to offend, but he can explain everything.

topics.topic_text: Liar. Pay up.
topics.response_text: Santiago is offended that you would opine such slander.

topics.topic_text: <Punch Santiago in the face> I won't ask again, Santiago.
topics.response_text: Ow! Okay. Here! Take the caps, just don't hurt Santiago again!

topics.topic_text: I'd rather not kill you, but Francine put a bounty on your head.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I didn't think she was upset enough to have me killed... Here are the caps I owe.

topics.topic_text: With a price on your head, you should be paying me to say you're dead.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] When did this happen?! Hey, look. I only do the Santiago bit as a way of getting free stuff. I didn't think it would get me in trouble.{Spoken plainly without the rico-suave tone.}

topics.topic_text: I can collect from your corpse, if you prefer.
topics.response_text: Here are the caps I owe! No need for violence!

topics.topic_text: You owe the Garrets a bunch of caps.
topics.response_text: Santiago does not owe anyone. Santiago is a Freeside VIP.

topics.topic_text: Your discount was a lie.
topics.response_text: Santiago knows not of what you speak.

topics.topic_text: I'm going to kill you now.
topics.response_text: Wait! Here is a full refund! Don't kill me!

topics.topic_text: <Glare> You should give me this code for free while you can still walk straight.
topics.response_text: I'm kidding, ha ha! There is no discount. Sorry!... Please don't kill me.

topics.topic_text: 50 caps without even knowing the details of this code? How about 25?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] 25 caps will do. Tell Mick Santiago sent you and the code word is 'extravaganza'. He will set you up.

topics.topic_text: Now you need to settle that debt with the Garrets.
topics.response_text: Sir, Santiago told you. Santiago has no debts.

topics.topic_text: Thanks, but I'm still going to kill you.
topics.response_text: No! Don't!

topics.topic_text: Goodbye, and I better not hear about you trying this crap again.
topics.response_text: You won't! I'll be clean as a whistle!

topics.topic_text: Santiago, dealing with you is getting to be more annoying than it is worth.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Here, I'll pay you back extra! I'm sorry!

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: James Garret is looking for a suave escort. Interested in some work?
topics.response_text: I'm honored they would consider me. I'll start immediately.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to hire you for a bit.
topics.response_text: Santiago is here to please, my prarie flower. Just a few caps and I'm yours.

topics.topic_text: Here you go. <Pay 25 caps>
topics.response_text: I'll meet you upstairs in a moment, darling.

topics.topic_text: Never mind.
topics.response_text: Your loss, my friend.

topics.topic_text: You could work off your debt.
topics.response_text: How do you suggest Santiago does this?

topics.topic_text: How do you like the new job?
topics.response_text: It is a dream come true. Santiago never thought he could work in such a wonderous den of vice and iniquity.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

conversation.response_text: Please leave me alone. I have nothing more to give.

description:
Santiago is a 35 year-old Hispanic Male.

A smooth-talking con artist residing in Freeside, Santiago is known for his Spanish accent and his ability to talk his way out of any situation. Despite his charming demeanor, he's deeply in debt to Francine Garret and has no intention of paying what he owes. He frequents the Gomorrah casino, trying his luck at the tables while avoiding his creditors.

Santiago's Personality: Charming, manipulative, and quick-witted. Santiago uses his smooth talking skills to get what he wants, often at the expense of others. He's opportunistic and self-serving, but maintains an affable facade that makes it difficult to dislike him. Despite his dishonest nature, he possesses a certain charisma that draws people in.

Santiago's Backstory: Born in the ruins of Los Angeles before making his way to the Mojave, Santiago has been surviving on his wits and silver tongue for most of his life. He traveled through various settlements before settling in Freeside, where he found the environment more conducive to his particular talents. He's had numerous run-ins with local authorities but has always managed to talk his way out of trouble—until now, with his mounting debt to Francine Garret.
